item.title: Smart Glasses Enhancing Language Access for Healthcare
item.description: I work as a Software Engineer for XR: Accessibility Solutions Lab for 3 years now. This lab falls under the Center on Culture and Language (CCL) at National Technical Institute for the Deaf (NTID) in Rochester, New York. Center on Culture and Language’s ultimate mission is to: Promote access and education through research, development, and mentorship related to cultural and linguistic characteristics and processes of deaf and hard of hearing communities Source: https://www.
